title: Confidential Client (Concealment, Night Vision Measures/Countermeasures, Color Visual Manipulation)
description: Working with/for a "Confidential Client" bringing highly advanced technologies to the men (and women) who need it to protect & defend our "National Interests" day & night on land in the air and at sea thus increasing the scope / lethality / survivability of these silent heroes. There are some direct-action roles but mostly applying existing situations with hands-off solutions. Overall, a Think-Tank with applications that may or may not be militarized for the betterment of National Objectives. This is my primary gig / my day job / and where my loyalty rests with respect to meeting objectives of not only the owner, but the investors, the scientists, and the great employees of this Organization who go about what they do with a level of professionalism and performance I've only witnessed in a few "organizations" in the US Military manned by the best & brightest / most capable humans on Earth. "Whats the color of the boat house at Hereford?" / Robert De Niro (Ronin)

title: KALO Consultants LLC (Owner)
company: Various Long-Term / Short-Term / & Currently Ongoing Positions
description: Heckler & Koch, Dillon Aero, LMT, DBT, Milliken, Sniper Cat, KDH, INFORCE, AAMI, VLTOR, MILKOR, and other Confidential Clients. Consulting Work - Plain and Simple... A proven track record exceeding 120M in sales for clients all over the globe. So if you want to make $$ then simply Stand-Up, Hook-Up, & Shuffle to the Door... KALO Consultants will take care of the rest - all you feel is the wind in your knees. Latest News as of 1st Quarter 2015: 1. Completed a "Consultation" with a British Company called "AlphaSights". The scope-of-work was mostly research & my own personal experience based - went splendid and the customer was pleased beyond measure. 2. Completed a "Consultation" with Peter Kiewit Infrastructure Company (Fortune 500 Company) on Leadership as it applies to recruiting talent for their organization. Very impressive organization and amazing people in the Human Resources Departments. 3. My part-time gig with Milliken will be ended as of January 2015 as I converted them from my individual assistance to a much larger venue coupling them with my main gig / day job which will propel both entities in a symbiotic fashion perfectly. Mission Complete. 4. On 1 February, 2015 I started a part-time gig with "Light Silencer" which is a company owned by two incredible individuals with an idea that will be as widespread as shoelaces mounted on all kinetic energy weapons in the small arms venue if my goals are met. "I'm pretty sure there's a lot more to life than being really, really, ridiculously good looking. And I plan on finding out what that is" / Derek Zoolander

title: LMT / Weapons Programs (SOF - Foreign and Domestic)
company: Lewis Machine & Tool (worked on Tier-1 Weapon Requirement "only" and Grenade Launcher
description: Working on both Domestic & International (Mostly Pacific) Special Operations Forces (SOF) Weapon Programs & Requirements in both the Classified and Unclassified Realm. Switched over to LMT from a previous part-time (after resigning from MILKOR) in the role of a Consulting gig (roughly a year) to a full-time position (also a year) to work on a Program of Record for particular customer and lay groundwork for a Multi-Shot Grenade Launcher (MSGL) offering to the general (military / law-enforcement) public. LMT is a Company with great potential, owned by Karl Lewis who surrounds himself with great folks making for an A-Team with folks like Doug Olsen (makes an incredible suppressor / silencer) & the lead guy for all things LMT named Mathew Pruitt (pictured below to my right at the Canadian Sniper Shoot) - he also gets my highest endorsement. The company also has many blue-collar folks on the floor who bust their asses daily day in and day out trying their best to compete in a highly competitive marketplace for those types of weapons, particulary the civilian marketplace. In my capacity & rather short tenure at LMT, I developed a "Concept Phase" for a possible 40MM Multi-Shot Grenade Launcher System (MGLS) in both Medium & Enhanced or High Velocity. Also conceived / and helped to develop a series of Drop-On "Fully" Suppressed Upper's for various Carbines "thru" Concept Phase, into possible Low Rate Initial Production (LRIP) in multiple calibers to include the 300 Whisper. I have departed LMT & will accept no future work (part-time or full time) from LMT or its interests nor will I represent or give any kind of endorsement either positive or negative on any LMT product. "Nothing to Live or Die for and no Religion Too" / John Lennon

title: Personal Security Detail (PSD)
description: Have done multiple PSD "Missions" or other unusual specialized ballistic work for clients from all walks of life. Here are a few examples of mission sets completed: 1. Provided armed (covert) overwatch of client and family during business trip to Washington DC over a 72 hour period. 2. Provided close-in security (unarmed) for a "DIVA" during a concert series in Hawaii, California, and Tokyo. 3. Provided armed "security" for Victoria's Secret "type" photo shoot in Africa for 14 models with a small team I assembled to include medical support. 4. Provided a Medical / Embassy Attache' / "Non-Permissive" extraction plan for an Ambassador and extended Family in a location that was not friendly when times became unruly for Christians. 5. Conducted "Site-Survey/s" for several Clients to include establishing Helicopter Landing Zones (on resort Golf Courses) & looking at differing threats that existing and eradicating "said threat" (legally) prior to Clients arriving on scene. Not everything requires a gun or an ice-pick. Sometimes, a simple phone call works to make things secure. 6. Developed a Concept Plan for shooting down Unmanned Aerial Vehicles (UAV's) with large caliber sniper rifle. Provided "Proof of Principle" by demonstrating the shooting down of said platform (overseas location) with a 300 WinMag Rifle (Accuracy International) in July 2014 for a famous movie star whose family was being stalked by creepy criminals that call themselves Paparazzi. Score = 1 for Personal Privacy / 0 for a Tabloid Magazine. 7. Conducted a Nitrox Dive (deepwater) in Florida to recover two bodies off the coast of Key West from a Honduran "Flag-Ship" that sunk in treacherous waters with two former US Air Force Pararescuemen. One body found - the other is still held by Davy Jones / Man-in-the-Gray-Suit / Tax Collector sadly. "The king called up his jet fighters. He said you better earn your pay... Drop your bombs between the minarets. Down the Casbah way..." / The Clash
name: Chaz Bowser

title: MILKOR USA ("All Things" Related to 40MM Multi-Shot Grenade Launcher)
description: I started working with MILKOR (part-time) as a Consultant for Richard Solberg in 2009. Then after a few months, the owner gracioulsy offered me a full-time gig and I took it. I primarily advised the owner (only) on Sales, Marketing, & the "Training Evolution" the way done by the US Military on & of all things M32. The company had a great trainer already with them (Erik Solberg) but to really move forward outside the owner (Gary Abrams) doing everything himself - I came on to divide clients and conquer. During timeframe at MILKOR the M32 went from SOF Specific Platform (MFP11) to USMC Common Issue in an IDIQ Contract Award at just under 50M - the largest award for a Multi-Shot Grenade Launcher (MSGL) in US history! Also worked on initial sales and marketing of the Garwood M-134 Mini-Gun that Abrams Airborne Manufacturing Incorporated (AAMI) was making or considering making with some de-linker improvements that are significant over the Dillon Aero Mini-Gun. MILKOR USA is the greatest manufacturer of a military grade 40mm MSGL in the United States / bar none. Gary (the owner) is stringent on his vision & I can tell you it is good (great) to work for a guy who knows his product, history, and manufacturing from the ground up to. Passed down from Father to Son - AAMI is a proud company that has stood the test of time & I would carry the M32 now makes into combat again & again even today without hesitation except concern over how to carry all the ammo that thing can shoot like nobody's business! Even Hollywood doesn't do it justice. The real heroes behind the success of the M32 are two fella's by the name of Brian (again) and Erik in Tucson, AZ. Also Richard Solberg who gave all/did all to win the USMC Contract making MILKOR a name in the United States. None other than those gentlemen (plus Gary Abrams himself) can take the credit for such a great success as the M32. I resigned in October of 2013 to move to another Weapon Company.
name: Chaz Bowser

title: Heckler and Koch USA
company: Heckler & Koch USA (Part-Time Consultant on Tier-1 Unit/s Requirements)
description: Worked as a Special Operations Advisor / Consultant to Heckler & Koch USA with some assistance to Heckler Koch Germany located in Oberdorf. Most attention on the HK416 system which included enhancements, alterations, marketing strategy from Tier-1 SOF to Tier-2 SOF and even Conventional Forces. Bar none - HK produces the best weapon systems across the gamut of any other company I have ever encountered. Wayne Weber has assembled an absolute team of winners with HK USA and without naming them all (all are top notch) - I will blanket endorse the company. Every other company out there that I have worked for in the past, or that makes or builds rifles - not one is comparable to HK... HK is to military grade Battle Rifles what Kelly Slater is to Professional Surfing. I had to resign from HK once I started work with Lewis Machine & Tool due to a conflict of interest. It was the worst business decision that I ever made. Hook, Line, and Sinker I was a Fool... ”To Hell with them Fellas. Buzzards gotta eat, same as Worms.” / Clint Eastwood (The Outlaw Josey Wales)
name: Chaz Bowser

title: First Spear
description: Worked on marketing fantastic body armor and other systems to Special Operations Forces while simultaneously marketing select items to Conventional Forces. Within ITAR Regulations, marketed said systems to South Korean Tier-1 Units also. SOAPBOX NOTE: One important note about Tactical Equipment / Clothing / Gear... "Friends Don't Let Friends Wear Tactical Clothing" (as a fashion accessory)... And if you have an "Assault Pack" on your back at a Trade Show - be doing some actual "Assaulting" or have done it the past at least... Playing "dress-up" only makes you look like a total Tool and a complete Douche-Bag & its insulting to those of us who used to do it as part of our duties. I don't wear a Home Depot or US Postal Service Uniform because I never worked there. Stop trying to act like you were part of something you did not have the courage or intestinal fortitude to sign up for. Pudgy, Chubby, Cherub Faced Civilians walking around at places like the Shot Show in Las Vegas is a fine place to see such cowards "Stylin' & Profilin" with the latest camo, latest folding knife (more than 1), 511 pants in with size 48 waist, rigger belts, and every patch that velcro can be sewn on stuck to everything they will stick to. Its gross... My assault pack is a pink "Hello Kitty" with a DADT patch on it. I'm just trying to stick with current Army trends of course thanks to the current CoS and past SGM of the Army whose only legacy will be DADT reversal. I guess the war wasn't a big enough deal to worry about. Oh - they outlawed tattoos and manhood too. Lets hope a new Ranger Qualified SGM of the Army will shoot a new azimuth and do the right thing when nobody is looking. "I can ride my bike with no handlebars No handlebars No handlebars I can ride my bike with no handlebars No handlebars No handlebars" / The Flobots

title: INFORCE (HTT)
description: Worked on a marketing strategy of a new what was (and still is) a weapon flashlight company to morph it into a laser target acquisition device to replace our current Special Operations Peculiar MODification (hence the acronym "SOPMOD" which is kind of a silly name I realize) Kit to our US SOF Units. I worked on merging (while on active duty as a Weapon Combat Developer {51A} at US Army Special Operations Command) from SOPMOD Block-1 to SOPMOD Block-2 and was fortunate to of obtained funding from Congress upwards of 96M to do so. We named it Miniature-Day/Night Sight (MDNS) which is an equally silly name. This was all the lasers, lights, sights, grips, rails, and even drop-on 10 inch upper's for Close Quarter Battle (CQB). That said, I looked far and wide to find a company to bring in a SOPMOD/MDNS "Block-3" offering if you will to the marketplace. INFORCE was the best company for this task so we joined forces. Unfortunately, the technology then (and even today in mid-2014) aren't at a point we found (INFORCE & KALO Consultants) that a significant enough improvement over SOPMOD/MDNS was feasible or even sensible. In retrospect - a wise choice by INFORCE to cease work. The company makes fantastic weapon lights. Best I've seen or used by far "Goodbye, Willie. I'm no fucking good. I never have been" / Lt. Col. Frank Slade (Al Pacino), Scent of a Woman.
name: Chaz Bowser

title: Dillon Aero
description: Worked as a marketing consultant for the M134 Mini-Gun system as a primary role. Secondary role was to market and bring in customers for Mike/Chris Dillon (and Greg Coker's) Mounted Sniper Program which trained snipers to engage/eradicate ground targets from helicopters. These targets ranged from vehicles, to key sites, to individual personnel. I brought in 75th Ranger Regiment to proctor the course and the course now is a wildly successful program. The Dillon Team makes the most effective and by far, the finest M134 Mini-Gun on Earth. One of the best companies I have witnessed and nothing but my highest praise. "Get To Da Choppa!" / Arnold "Dutch" Schwarzenegger in Predator

title: KDH Defense Systems Inc.
description: Worked on development of Special Operations Specific Body Armor Ensemble. One for Breachers, one for Assaulters, one for PSD work (low profile), and floatable systems. Kudos' to the company for a truly great Engineering Team that try their damnedest daily to do the right thing for the right reasons & for the people who need it the most. And the seasonal help in North Carolina at the factory. Amazing folks. A truly dedicated group of Americans that work behind the scenes to bring our Troopers serving in combat back home. And they do it by keeping them alive after they have been shot or blown up. Truly an honorable product to associate one's-self with. ADMIN NOTE: "Any man I see out there, I'm gonna kill him. Any son of a bitch takes a shot at me, I'm not only going to kill him, I'm going to kill his wife and all his friends and burn his damn house down." / Clint Eastwood (Unforgiven) & most recently (and highly impressive for a World Leader to say to the enemy of his Nation) Jordan's King Abdullah II. We certainly haven't seen that kind of leadership in our own Nation in my lifetime. I must admit that I'm glad your chickens have come home to roost. Now make fertilizer out of those scumbags so my Son doesn't have to come over there and waste his time trying to fix what can't be fixed getting hurt in the process possibly.
name: Chaz Bowser

title: Green Tree Trading Company
description: Worked on marketing a bullet that (in theory) would defeat all known body armor based on the blending or mixing of certain metals while being inherently accurate based on even mixing of all metals in the individual round. Promised an increase in 7.62 bullets to an eight of a Minute of Angle (MOA) at all maximum effective ranges which is unheard of in the global sniper community. The end-result while impressive, did not reach the point that a decision was made to procure. Competing demands, skepticism (impressive promises from an engineering standpoint), and a number of factors did not bring product to market during my tenure as a Consultant. Hope to see it in use in the future however!

title: State Farm Insurance Agent

I've been asked to stifle my opinions about State Farm and agreed to since they did pay me graciously for my training & work. But I will say this... I cancelled all my policies from Home, Auto, Life, to Investment Portfolios. That should say all that needs to be said. "If you're gonna be dumb, you gotta be tough When you get knocked down you gotta get back up, I ain't the sharpest knife in the drawer but I know enough, to know, If your gonna be dumb, you gotta be tough" / Roger Alan Wade

title: US Military (Retired 24 Years Enlisted & Officer Combined)
description: Various Conventional & Special Operations Forces (SOF) Assignments / Enlisted & Officer. Held all positions expected of a career Infantryman (Enlisted & Officer) with all expected qualifications (such as Ranger, Master Parachutist, etc...). Even served as a "Cabin Boy" (Aide) to a General. Weapon Subject Matter Expert (SME) ranging from Battle Rifles, Sniper Rifles, Single Shot and Multiple Shot Grenade Launchers (MSGL's), Shotgun's, Breaching Rounds & Specialty Shotgun Ammo, Heavy/Medium/Light Machine Guns, Mortar Systems, Suppressors, Personal Defense Weapons (PDW's), Low Visibility Assault Weapons, Mounted Mini-Guns, and Pistols across the whole range of systems including ammunition. Also SME for Personal Security, Personal Protection Equipment (PPE) / Body Armor. Providing "Proof-of-Life" in worldwide locations, Permissive & Non-Permissive "Recovery" Missions, Reconnaissance, Pre-Site Surveys for Dignitaries, Helicopter Sniper Operations, Laser Designation/Targeting Systems, and Weapon Optics. SME in all types of other Small Arms Ammunition. SME & Former SOF Lead for the US Government Joint Wound Ballistic Review Board / Committee. Also SME and Former SOF Source Selection Board Lead / Officer for Military Free-Fall & Combat Diver Systems, Tactics, & Procedures. Sapper, SME on United States Federal Acquisition Regulations (FAR) / Cost, Schedule, and Performance Dynamics from a "Real World" / Valid Perspective. Specialize in bringing idea/s from designers into the marketplace from a multi-angle / multi-echelon perspective & if "said" item fills a "Capability Gap" (known or unknown) can cross-walk it to funding which is an additional skill set (obtaining funding and validation) from various Commanders. Have also done VIP Protection both Domestically/Abroad. Attended over 100 "Consideration of Others" Training Sessions too!
name: Chaz Bowser

education.name: Wright State University
education.description: Master's Degree, Philosophy & Political Science, 3.8 GPA

title: Police Officer - San Bernardino County
description: Served as a Police Officer in High Desert area of San Bernardino. Graduated from San Bernardino Sheriffs Academy and went straight to the street (Deputy's work in the jail as "turn-key's" initially) and drank from a fire-hose like most cops do for the first year. Pretty soon, you catch on and find that most victims were the same guys were the perpetrator of a crime the week before. Seems like a giant circle of life... This position was filled during a break in service between Enlisted Air Force (Homestead AFB, Florida) / Enlisted Army (Fort Irwin, California) and transition to a Commissioned Officer. The experience helped me to greatly accelerate my first Bachelor's Degree at Wright State University in Pre-Law / Philosophy / Political Science using a combination of academic experience / practical experience / and street experience that the University converted into credits essentially filling all my common-courses leaving only core-courses to graduate. Hence the degree so quickly by the clock. "You know, there's like a boat-load of gangs at this school. This one gang kept wanting me to join because I'm pretty good with a bo staff" / Napoleon Dynamite
name: Chaz Bowser
